item.title: Professional Pivot: Zero Connections → Infrastructure Build
item.description:
Professional Pivot: Zero Connections → Infrastructure Build

Summary: Encountered ‘zero connections’ wall; chose two-phase build: foundation first, then outreach.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 2

Strategy

  1. Phase 1: Build foundation (30–50 connections, polish profile)
  2. Phase 2: Strategic outreach

Status

Building connections step by step. Accepted and pending connections are all relevant — recruiters or from places where applications were submitted.

item.title: Fortress Base: Low-Complexity Stability
item.description:
Fortress Base: Low-Complexity Stability

Summary: Build a ‘Fortress Base’ job (low complexity, high stability) that funds the rebuild and reduces volatility.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batches 4–6

Principle

A Fortress Base provides low-cognitive-overhead anchor employment. It creates psychic and financial space for sovereign construction.

Current Implementation

PostNL mail sorting — started November 25, 2025.

Function

Not the destination. The platform from which to build.
